Hi guys.

Using heritrix 3.1.1.
I want heritrix to fetch the seeds from a d=
atabase table, and have implemented a custom SeedModule that does it, and r=
eplaced the TextSeedModule with the custom module.
A couple of questions th=
ough. First off, I havent really scrutinized the heritrix source/documentat=
ion, but as I got it from the logs, the SeedModule has been addressed just =
once, in the beginning of a crawl, saying announceSeeds(). Is it possible t=
o somehow manually call the announceSeeds() method? It would even be better=
 if I could call it in a given interval, to see if there are new seeds in t=
he database.
Secondly, when a job is first run, if no seeds are available i=
n the database, the job finishes (or pauses before finishing) right away. A=
ny suggestions on how I could pause the job and from time to time poll the =
database to see if new seeds available?
Thanks in advance and highly apprec=
iate any suggestions.

Regards,
progre55
